The Barangay Poblacion Portal!

Welcome to the Barangay Poblacion Portal! This portal is designed to streamline administrative processes and improve communication between the barangay and its residents.

Project Features

  • User Login and Registration
  • Admin Dashboard
  • Request Management
  • Complaint Management
  • Responsive Design
  • Secure Verification

Project Description

The Barangay Poblacion portal is a web-based application designed to digitize and simplify barangay operations. It allows residents to interact with the barangay office online, reducing the need for physical visits.

Admins can efficiently handle requests and complaints through an intuitive dashboard, while residents can easily access services from the comfort of their homes.

How the Project Works

  • Residents: Log in to submit requests for barangay documents or file complaints. Track the status of submissions through the portal.
  • Admin Users: Log in to the admin dashboard to review and manage requests and complaints. Approve or reject requests and resolve complaints efficiently.
  • Verification: Admin login includes a verification step to ensure only authorized personnel can access the dashboard.
  • Logout: Both residents and admins can securely log out of the system to protect their accounts.
